appSubtitle: AI-Powered Blueprints for Your Next Local Venture
errorFailedToGenerate: Failed to generate ideas. The model may be unavailable. Please try again later.
noIdeasFoundMessage: The AI couldn't generate startup ideas for {city}. This could be a temporary issue. Please try a different city or rephrase your request.
welcomeMessage: Enter a city name above to generate innovative, low-competition startup ideas tailored to its unique environment.
loadingMessage: The AI is thinking, please wait a moment.
footerDisclaimer: Powered by Google Gemini. All ideas are AI-generated and require further research.
